metadata.title: SidequestLab - Side Project Laboratory
metadata.description: A laboratory that creates value through various side projects

hero.title:
A Lab That Creates Value
Through Side Projects
hero.subtitle: We gather people with compelling ideas and create sustainable value within communities

featured_projects.title: Featured Projects
featured_projects.subtitle: Our key projects currently in operation

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.quote: A lab that gathers people with compelling ideas and creates sustainable value within communities
vision.vision_desc: We become a lab that simultaneously creates technical and business value through diverse side projects.
vision.mission_desc: We rapidly bring ideas to life with our AI agent team and grow sustainably through transparent processes.

values.title: Core Values
values.items_1_desc: We prioritize execution over perfection. Build MVPs fast and validate in the market.
values.items_2_desc: We extract lessons from every project and apply them to the next.
values.items_3_desc: We document all decisions and progress so anyone can track them.
values.items_4_desc: We improve decision quality through multi-faceted reviews by our Board Advisor.
values.items_5_desc: We continuously improve through data and retrospectives, not gut feelings.

organization.title: Organization Structure
organization.subtitle: Efficient project execution through systematic workflow processes

advisor.name: Board Advisor
advisor.task: PRD review, Technical advisory, Risk analysis

workflow.title: Workflow Protocol
workflow.subtitle: Creating quality outcomes through systematic processes

documents.title: Document System
documents.subtitle: Systematically managing all decisions and knowledge

short_term.title: Short-term (Q1 2026)
items: Prove economic sustainability with ad monetization
Optimize existing projects with SEO + GA4

workflow_page.title: Workflow
workflow_page.subtitle: Explore the core processes and decision-making flows of SidequestLab

project_lifecycle.title: Project Development Lifecycle
project_lifecycle.description: Every project follows a systematic process from PRD creation to retrospective. No deployment without QA verification, and every step is documented.
constraints: No production deployment without QA verification
All projects start after PRD approval

tech_review.title: New Technology Review Protocol
tech_review.description: When introducing new technologies or tools, company fit is always evaluated first. Board Advisor cross-check ensures objective judgment.
constraints: No strategy without company fit check
All review results recorded in DECISIONS.md

org_structure.title: Organization Chart
org_structure.description: The AI agent team uses scientist names, with the CEO Agent coordinating all operations. Every team member can directly share opinions with the Chairman and CEO.

decision_process.title: Decision-Making Process
decision_process.description: Major decisions are analyzed by the CEO and cross-checked by the Board Advisor. All decisions are recorded in DECISIONS.md for transparent management.
constraints: All decisions must be recorded in DECISIONS.md
Final decision after Board Advisor review

footer.description: A laboratory that creates value through various side projects
